hero.title: Your Complete Woodworking Project Manager
hero.subtitle: Plan, estimate, and track your woodworking projects with precision. Manage lumber inventory, calculate costs, and organize your workshop toolsâ€”all in one place.

features.title: Everything You Need for Woodworking
features.subtitle: Professional tools to help you plan, track, and manage all aspects of your woodworking projects.

projects.title: Project Management
projects.description: Plan and estimate projects with detailed material calculations, cost breakdowns, and board footage tracking.

lumber.title: Lumber Inventory
lumber.description: Track lumber types, pricing, hardness ratings (Janka), and recommended uses for each wood species.

finishes.title: Finish Catalog
finishes.description: Organize your wood finish products with pricing, descriptions, and application recommendations.

tools.title: Tool Tracking
tools.description: Catalog your workshop tools with serial numbers, purchase dates, and equipment costs.

calculations.title: Automatic Calculations
calculations.description: Calculate board footage, material costs, and project totals automatically with precise measurements.

tracking.title: Investment Tracking
tracking.description: Monitor your total investment in materials, tools, and projects with detailed analytics.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join woodworkers who use Woodwork to manage their projects professionally.
